mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ADM_SELLER_INFO(SELLER_NAME, SELLER_CONTACT, STD_DT, BLOCK_YN, REG_DT, UPD_DT, UPD_ID, BLOCK_DT, BLOCK_ID) VALUES (#{sellerName}, #{sellerContact}, #{stdDt}, 'N', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '', null, '')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ADM_SELLER_INFO WHERE STR_TO_DATE(STD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT * FROM TB_ADM_SELLER_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND SELLER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sellerName}, '%')
AND STR_TO_DATE(STD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ADM_SELLER_INFO SET BLOCK_YN = 'Y', UPD_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), BLOCK_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), UPD_ID = #{adminId}, BLOCK_ID = #{adminId} WHERE SELLER_NAME = #{sellerName}
